verses.verse: <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1129>"Build<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>"

<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> and <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram.<s%>

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3320>"Stand<s%> by your burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and I will <S%H3212>go:<s%> perhaps <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7136>come<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1697>me;<s%> and whatever he <S%H7200>shows<s%> me I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H3212>you.<s%>" He went to a bare <S%H8205>height.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6186>him,<s%> "I have prepared the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and I have <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>'s <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and thus you shall <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"
He <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H5324>him,<s%> and behold, he was standing by his burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> <S%H8269>he,<s%> and all the princes of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

He took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "From <S%H758>Aram<s%> has <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H5148>brought<s%> <S%H4428>me,<s%> the king of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> from the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of the <S%H6924>East.<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for <S%H3212>me.<s%> Come, <S%H2194>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> shall I <S%H5344>curse<s%> whom <S%H410>God<s%> has not <S%H6895>cursed?<s%> How shall I <S%H2194>defy<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not <S%H2194>defied?<s%>

For from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1389>him.<s%> From the hills I see <S%H7789>him.<s%> Behold, it is a <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7931>dwells<s%> <S%H910>alone,<s%> and shall not be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Who can <S%H4487>count<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> or <S%H4557>number<s%> the <S%H7255>fourth<s%> part of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3477>righteous!<s%> Let my last end be like <S%H319>his!<s%>"

<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "What have you <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3947>me?<s%> I took you to <S%H6895>curse<s%> my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H1288>behold,<s%> you have blessed them <S%H1288>altogether.<s%>"
He <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Must I not take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> that which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7760>puts<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth?<s%>"

<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Please come with me to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> where you may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7200>them;<s%> you shall see <S%H657>but<s%> the <S%H7097>utmost<s%> part of <S%H7200>them,<s%> and shall not see them <S%H6895>all:<s%> and curse me them from there."

He <S%H3947>took<s%> him into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6839>Zophim,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H3320>"Stand<s%> <S%H3541>here<s%> by your burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> while I <S%H7136>meet<s%> over <S%H3541>there.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7136>met<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and say <S%H559>this.<s%>"

He <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5324>him,<s%> and behold, he was standing by his burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> with <S%H1111>him.<s%> Balak <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>him,<s%> "What has Yahweh <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>"

He took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear!<s%> <S%H238>Listen<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> you son of <S%H6834>Zippor.<s%>

<S%H410>God<s%> is not a <S%H376>man,<s%> that he should <S%H3576>lie,<s%> nor the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> that he should <S%H5162>repent.<s%> Has he <S%H559>said,<s%> and will he not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1696>it?<s%> Or has he spoken, and will he not make it <S%H6965>good?<s%>
<S%H3947>Behold,<s%> I have received a command to <S%H1288>bless.<s%> He has <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> and I <S%H7725>can't<s%> reverse it.

He has not <S%H5027>seen<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> Neither has he <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5999>perverseness<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> is with <S%H8643>him.<s%> The shout of a king is among <S%H4428>them.<s%>
<S%H410>God<s%> brings them <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> He has as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of the wild <S%H7214>ox.<s%>

Surely there is no <S%H5173>enchantment<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> Neither is there any <S%H7081>divination<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H6256>Now<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> What has <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6466>done!<s%>

<S%H5971>Behold,<s%> the people rises <S%H6965>up<s%> as a <S%H3833>lioness,<s%> As a <S%H3833>lion<s%> he lifts himself <S%H5375>up.<s%> He shall not lie <S%H7901>down<s%> until he <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and <S%H8354>drinks<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>"
<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "Neither <S%H5344>curse<s%> them at <S%H6895>all,<s%> nor <S%H1288>bless<s%> them at <S%H6895>all.<s%>"

But <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1696>"Didn't<s%> I tell <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H3068><s%> 'All that Yahweh <S%H1696>speaks,<s%> that I must <S%H6213>do?<s%>'"

<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come<s%> <S%H3947>now,<s%> I will take you to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> perhaps it will <S%H3474>please<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> that you may curse me them from <S%H6895>there.<s%>"
<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor,<s%> that <S%H8259>looks<s%> <S%H6440>down<s%> on the <S%H3452>desert.<s%>

<S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1129>"Build<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> me here <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>"
<S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> up a <S%H6499>bull<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> on every <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
